title: Sin City: The Hard Goodbye #4
author: Frank Miller
synopsis: A neo-noir crime thriller that follows a tough-as-nails ex-con named Marv as he seeks revenge for the murder of a prostitute he was involved with.

title: Akira #1
author: Katsuhiro Otomo
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic Neo-Tokyo - a biker gang member named Kaneda uncovers a government conspiracy involving psychic powers and a mysterious figure known as Akira.

title: Black Panther #1
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates
synopsis: Black Panther follows the story of T'Challa - the king ofWakanda - a technologically advanced African nation that is also home to the rare metal vibranium. The series explores themes of politics power and the responsibilities of leadership.

title: Black Science #1
author: Rick Remender
synopsis: Former member of The Anarchistic Order of Scientists Grant McKay has finally done the impossible: He has deciphered Black Science and punched through the barriers of reality. But what lies beyond the veil is not epiphany but chaos.
